documents.document: The best 2* hotel in town My wife and I have just returned from Florence having stayed at this delightful, quietly located hotel, just 15 minutes from the Duomo by regular bus services.Sabina and her husband were always most friendly helpful and offered us a really substantial breakfast to start the day.Following an incident when my wallet was stolen, Sabina generously spent her Saturday evening with me at the Carabinieri translating their report and helping with the necessary telephoning of my credit card details to the visa banking service.We wish them both well and every success in their new business.James Beardsell. Broadstone. Dorset. U.K.
